meanings.sent1: The pithiest way to explain the concept was with a single word.
meanings.sent2: Her pithiest remarks always left a lasting impact on the audience.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's pithiest joke had everyone laughing uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: In the world of poetry, brevity is key to creating the pithiest verses.
meanings.sent5: His pithiest advice was to always speak the truth, no matter the consequences.

meanings.definition: Containing or having a lot of pith.
meanings.sent1: The pithiest oranges are usually the juiciest ones.
meanings.sent2: The chef selected the pithiest lemons for the recipe.
meanings.sent3: The tree with the pithiest branches provided ample shade on hot days.
meanings.sent4: The pithiest stems of the plant held the most nutrients.
meanings.sent5: The pithiest part of the fruit is often discarded, but it contains valuable nutrients.
